title: WhatsApp readying quick Reactions for its Stories-like status feature
content:
As WhatsApp is readying the new Reactions feature for its users in a future update, the app is also working on the ability to bring an Instagram Stories–like feature to its Status tab by adding quick reactions to users’ posts.

more…

The post WhatsApp readying quick Reactions for its Stories-like status feature appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: WhatsApp is working on the ability to bring an Instagram Stories-like feature to its Status tab by adding quick reactions to users' posts.
